messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be used to negotiate a hazard in Call of Cthulhu?
A skill or choice of skills that can be used to negotiate a hazard, along with a difficulty level.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper's role in determining acceptable skills for negotiation?
The Keeper is final arbiter of what skill is acceptable.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of an appropriate skill to climb over fences and walls?
Climb skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill allows investigators to run along the top of a wall without falling off?
DEX (Dexterity) skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of the Keeper in negotiating hazards?
The Keeper will specify a skill or choice of skills that can be used to negotiate a hazard, along with a difficulty level.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of an appropriate skill for negotiating obstacles?
The Climb skill, such as to get over fences and walls, or to climb down from a high window.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some examples of skills that Harvey can use?
Climb skill, Swim skill, Dodge skill, STR skill, DEX skill, and Drive Auto.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is Harvey asked to make a DEX roll?
Because Harvey is trying to run along the top of a wall without falling off.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Harvey decide to do when he sees the muddy patch on the track?
He charges towards the muddy patch, taking big strides.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Harvey's DEX roll?
Harvey moves onto the next location, having used his one movement action for this round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to Harvey on his turn?
Harvey charges towards the muddy patch.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the farmer on his turn?
The farmer slips and falls after failing his DEX roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of damage the Keeper chooses for FarmerHarvey?
Moderate Injury
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many points of damage does the Keeper choose for FarmerHarvey?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the farmer must pay in addition to the damage?
1 additional movement action
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the farmer's movement actions because of the delay?
The delay will cost one of his two movement actions in the next round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will be lost to FarmerHarvey after the delay?
One of his two movement actions
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of badly handled hazards on characters and vehicles?
They can cause harm
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper's role in a chase scene?
To present the hazard and allow characters to decide how to deal with it
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What might be the approach taken to break down a locked door or take corners at speed?
A reckless approach, using brute force and speed
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule for gaining bonus dice on a skill roll to negotiate a hazard?
1 movement action buys 1 bonus die, or 2 movement actions buys 2 bonus dice.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum number of bonus dice that can be rolled?
2 bonus dice
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the character or vehicle fails to negotiate a hazard?
The Keeper decides if damage is inflicted on the character or vehicle, and how much, using a guide.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What table should be used to determine damage to characters if the skill roll is failed?
Table III: Other Forms of Damage
